LBANN Documentation

Overview

LBANN ( Livermore Big Artificial Neural Network) is a toolkit for deep learning training on HPC systems.

Warning:
This manual is under construction. Please direct questions to lbann-dev@llnl.gov. Users are encourage to join lbann-users@llnl.gov.

This manual is divided in the following sections:

  • Getting Started
  • Basic Usage
  • Developer Guide
  • Publications
